text: The Rover 25 is a car produced by Rover. It replaced the Rover 200 Series in late 1999 and received a sporty version in 2001 with the MG ZR. It was facelifted in 2004 and was produced until 2005 with the collapse of MG Rover. == Engines == * 1.1 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.4 62 kW (84 hp) and 76 kW (103 hp) * 1.6 80 kW (109 hp) * 1.8 86 kW (117 hp) and 107 kW (145 hp) * 2.0 TD 74 kW (101 hp) and 83 kW (113 hp) == References == 25 Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:Sedans
title: Rover 25
